minutes_deduc: deduction the wage of delayed minutes
hours_deduc: deduction the wage of delayed minutes
leave_days: deduction the wage of leaving period
الحرمان من الترقيات أو العلاوات لمرة واح: Prevention from promotion or bonus for one time
فصل من الخدمة مع المكافأة : إذا لم يتجاو: End of service with reward if the total of absence days did not reach (30) days
فصل من الخدمة طبقاً للمادة (الثمانون) من: Firing from service according to article (eighty) in work system
الحرمان من الترقيات ، والعلاوات لمرة واح: Prevention from promotion or bonus for one time and notice him with firing notice according to article (eighty) in work system
الفصل دون مكافئة أو تعويض على أن يسبقه إ: Firing without reward or compensation that shall be preceded by written notice after absence by ten days, according to article (eighty) in work system
